title: New Bus Service Schedule Released
snippet: The schedule for the new daily bus service connecting Bhaily to Vadodara central bus station is now available at the Panchayat office.

title: New Community Well Inaugurated
snippet: A new community well was inaugurated near the main temple, providing easier access to clean water for residents in the eastern part of the village.

title: School Exam Results Announced
snippet: Results for the annual exams at the Bhaily Primary School have been announced. Parents can collect report cards from the school office.

title: Successful Harvest Festival
snippet: This year's harvest festival (Uttarayan) saw record attendance and participation from neighboring villages as well. Kite flying event was a major success.

title: Road Repair Work Completed
snippet: Repair work on the main road entering the village, which started in November, has now been successfully completed.
